item.description:
Hello everyone!  

One game decides it all!!!

The Vancouver Canucks have never won Stanley, and Boston hasn't won since 1972!! Madness!!  We can't ask for anything more. The game will no doubt go down to the wire, and be end to end. Not to be missed. So come on out sporting your colours, have a drink, grab some food and get ready for a game that all of Canada will be tuned into. 

The game is scheduled for around 8, but the place will be filled well in advance. I suggest trying to arrive early, especially if you want a seat. I will arrive at 7, maybe earlier.  If you can't find us, my cell is 857-221-2041. See you there!

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Game 7 Stanley Cup Finals!!!
